Key Match Events: Dallas Mavericks lost to the Phoenix Suns by one point, 114-113.
Luka Doncic had a team-high 30 points for Dallas.
Naji Marshall and Daniel Gafford added 18 and 15 points, respectively.
Phoenix big man Jusuf Nurkic split free throws with 0.8 seconds left after being fouled off an offensive rebound.
Post-Match Reflections: Jason Kidd expressed disappointment with the underwhelming performance of the Dallas Mavericks bench.
Jason Kidd emphasized the need for more spirited participation from the bench to achieve their goals this season.
